HelpXML.Title: HUpsider
HelpXML.Purpose: HUpsider computes derivative of psi function (second derivative of rho function) for Tukey's biweight

Item.Name: u
Item.LongDesc: n x 1 vector containing for the n units of the sample scaled residuals or Mahalanobis distances

Item.Name: c
Item.LongDesc: scalar greater than 0 which controls the robustness/efficiency of the estimator (beta in regression or mu in the location case ...)

Item.Name: psider
Item.LongDesc: n x 1 vector which contains the values of the derivative of the Huber psi function associated to the residuals or Mahalanobis distances for the n units of the sample.

HelpXML.MoreAbout: Function HUpsider transforms vector x as follows HUpsider(x)= \[ HUpsider(u)= \left\{ \begin{array}{cc} 1 & \mbox{if } |u/c| \leq 1 \\ 0 & |u/c|>1 \\ \end{array} \right. \]

References.Item: Maronna, R.A., Martin D. and Yohai V.J. (2006), Robust Statistics, Theory and Methods, Wiley, New York.
